verses.verse: רַנְּנ֣וּ <S%H7442><s%> ran-ne-Nu Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-di-kim O ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> lay-sha-Rim, for the upright נָאוָ֥ה <S%H5000><s%> na-Vah is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lah. [for] praise

הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> ho-Du Praise לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <S%H3658><s%> be-chin-Nor; with harp בְּנֵ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> be-Ne-vel unto him with the psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <S%H6218><s%> a-Sor, [and] an instrument of ten strings זַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-ru- sing לֽוֹ׃ lo.

שִֽׁירוּ־ <S%H7891><s%> shi-ru- Sing ל֭וֹ lo שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> shir song חָדָ֑שׁ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash; unto him a new הֵיטִ֥יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> hei-Ti-vu skilfully נַ֝גֵּ֗ן <S%H5059><s%> nag-Gen, play בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8643><s%> bit-ru-'Ah. with a loud noise

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> ya-Shar [is] right דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- For the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Se-hu, and all his works בֶּאֱמוּנָֽה׃ <S%H530><s%> be-'e-mu-Nah. [are done] in truth

אֹ֭הֵב <S%H157><s%> 'O-hev He loveth צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> tze-da-Kah righteousness וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat; and judgment חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed of the goodness יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> mal-'Ah is full הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var By the word יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim were the heavens נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Su; made וּבְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> u-ve-Ru-ach of them by the breath פִּ֝֗יו <S%H6310><s%> Piv, of his mouth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all צְבָאָֽם׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Am. and all the host

כֹּנֵ֣ס <S%H3664><s%> ko-Nes He gathereth כַּ֭נֵּד <S%H5067><s%> Kan-ned together as an heap מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mei the waters הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam; of the sea נֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten he layeth up בְּאֹצָר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> be-'o-tza-Rot in storehouses תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> te-ho-Mot. the depth

יִֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> yi-re-'U fear מֵ֭יְהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; Let all the earth מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at יָ֝ג֗וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gu-ru, stand in awe כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei let all the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel. of the world

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar For he spake וַיֶּ֑הִי <S%H1961><s%> vai-Ye-hi; done הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- He צִ֝וָּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah, and it was [done] he commanded וַֽיַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> Vai-ya-'a-Mod. and it stood fast

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD הֵפִ֥יר <S%H6331><s%> he-Fir to nought עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> 'a-tzat- the counsel גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim; of the heathen הֵ֝נִ֗יא <S%H5106><s%> he-Ni, of none effect מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <S%H4284><s%> mach-she-Vot the devices עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim. of the people

עֲצַ֣ת <S%H6098><s%> 'a-Tzat The counsel יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> ta-'a-Mod; standeth מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <S%H4284><s%> mach-she-Vot the thoughts לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, of his heart לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor to all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor. generations

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Blessed הַ֭גּוֹי <S%H1471><s%> Hag-goy [is] the nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav; whose God הָעָ֓ם׀ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am [and] the people בָּחַ֖ר <S%H977><s%> ba-Char [whom] he hath chosen לְנַחֲלָ֣ה <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah for his own inheritance לֽוֹ׃ lo.

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> Mish-sha-ma-yim from heaven הִבִּ֣יט <S%H5027><s%> hib-Bit looketh יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD רָ֝אָ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Ah, he beholdeth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei all the sons הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam. of men

מִֽמְּכוֹן־ <S%H4349><s%> mi-me-chon- From the place שִׁבְתּ֥וֹ <S%H3427><s%> shiv-To of his habitation הִשְׁגִּ֑יחַ <S%H7688><s%> hish-Gi-ach; he looketh אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> 'el on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei upon all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

הַיֹּצֵ֣ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer He fashioneth יַ֣חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad alike לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam; their hearts הַ֝מֵּבִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> ham-me-Vin, he considereth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-sei-Hem. all their works

אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- else הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Ham-Me-lech There is no king נוֹשָׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> no-Sha' saved בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> be-rov- by the multitude חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; of an host גִּ֝בּ֗וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor, a mighty man לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not יִנָּצֵ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> yin-na-Tzel is not delivered בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> be-rov- by much כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach. strength

שֶׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker [is] a vain thing הַ֭סּוּס <S%H5483><s%> Has-sus An horse לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H8668><s%> lit-shu-'Ah; for safety וּבְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> u-ve-Ro [any] by his great חֵ֝יל֗וֹ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Lo, strength לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> ye-mal-Let. neither shall he deliver

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> 'ein Behold the eye יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְרֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Av; [is] upon them that fear לַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <S%H3176><s%> lam-ya-cha-Lim him upon them that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> le-chas-Do. in his mercy

לְהַצִּ֣יל <S%H5337><s%> le-hatz-Tzil To deliver מִמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> mi-Ma-vet from death נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sham; their soul וּ֝לְחַיּוֹתָ֗ם <S%H2421><s%> u-le-chai-yo-Tam, and to keep them alive בָּרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av. in famine

נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <S%H5315><s%> Naf-she-nu Our soul חִכְּתָ֣ה <S%H2442><s%> chik-ke-Tah waiteth לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; for the LORD עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Re-nu he [is] our help וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-gin-Ne-nu and our shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. Him

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because ב֭וֹ vo יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall rejoice לִבֵּ֑נוּ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Be-nu; For our heart כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because בְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho in his holy בָטָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H982><s%> va-Ta-che-nu. in him because we have trusted

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> ye-hi- Let חַסְדְּךָ֣ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-Cha Let thy mercy יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; as כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher, we יִחַ֥לְנוּ <S%H3176><s%> yi-Chal-nu be upon us according as we hope לָֽךְ׃ Lach.
